channel.title: Censor the following words
channel.description:
This forum is getting out of control. People are advertising non stop. So you should censor the following
Sorry, theres no section for this :(
no-ip .com .org .info .net servegame servebeer smfforfree ipbfree
Ect.
If it doesnt stop, eventually it will be overun with ads. I say stop it at its roots

item.title: Censor the following words
item.dc:creator: @templer templer
item.description:
@templer wrote:

yeah the download section would suck like trying to get onto a link uppit./*****

yeah ok?

Read full topic

item.title: Censor the following words
item.dc:creator: @Ii_1337_iI Ii 1337 iI
item.description:
@Ii_1337_iI wrote:

If we censer those words, the downloads section would only have the option to attach the file to the thread and sometimes that takes a long time to upload and download and you need to be member of the forums to do that, and that would only make more noobs join.

Read full topic
